definition: able and efficient
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
surname Neng
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: He is a lewd of a dandy, but admits skill, shrewd.
sentences.chinese: 他固然是個好色的紈絝子弟，但身手矯捷，精明能幹。

sentences.english: You deserve to marry a capable and intelligent guy like me.
sentences.chinese: 你就該嫁給一個像我這樣精明能幹的人。

sentences.english: Doris has really got a good head on her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 多利斯精明能幹，我想她一定能做一名好經理。

sentences.english: She had always struck him as so poised, so competent.
sentences.chinese: 她給他的印象是如此的鎮定自若，精明能幹。

sentences.english: A good leader should be both competent and efficient.
sentences.chinese: 一名好領導應該精明能幹，辦事效率高。

sentences.english: The longer I lived in London, the savvier I felt.
sentences.chinese: 我在倫敦生活的時間越長，就越覺得自己精明能幹。

sentences.english: I'm sure one of your gifts is the gift of a smart and capable brain.
sentences.chinese: 我確信你們的天賦之一就是擁有精明能幹的頭腦。

definition: agility
selfless/impartial
quick-witted/agile of mind
pass like thunder and move like the wind (idiom); swift and decisive reaction
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
upright and plainspoken
young and promising
magnanimous
educated and well-balanced (idiom)
standing above the common crowd (idiom); outstanding/excellent and unrivaled
competitive/ambitious and aggressive/to desire to beat others
to show off one's ability
to follow through/to carry through to the end
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
to weigh up sb's words and observe their facial expression (idiom)/to discern what sb thinks from his body language
